title: Roasted breast of Gressingham duck with baby vegetables and griottine cherries
description: Nothing but the best here with specialty duck breast and sautéed baby vegetables topped with liqueur soaked cherries.
ingredients: 1 bunch baby carrots, peeled and trimmed
salt and freshly ground black pepper
20 griottine cherries (morello cherries soaked in kirsh)
2 tbsp baby beetroot cress, to garnish
